page.title: 09Family Life in a Shop
page.content: I live in a shop that sells clothes and wool. Because of this, my parents, especially my mother, work as shop keepers. Our house is designed so that the living room and kitchen are behind the shop. Upstairs is like a normal house, having bedrooms and a bathroom. All the family, including myself and my grandmother (who lived in the shop before we did), help in the shop. Most of the work demands at least one person working, so we can't very often go out on holidays though sometimes we go to the coast on Sundays. We have guard dogs incase we have any break-ins. These also are pets. The shop opens at 9 a.m. and shuts at 6 p.m..This means 9 hours of work for my mother.
